featured.text: “They are very hot this year,” said Yossi Fogel at B & H Photo in New York.

definition.zh_def: 一種用於捕捉或捕獲的裝置，通常是用於捕捉魚類或其他水生生物的網。
definition.en_def: A type of device used for catching or trapping, typically a net used for capturing fish or other aquatic creatures.
definition.example: The fisherman cast his fogel into the water to catch some fish.
